schema.description: Schema attribute definition as defined in RFC 7643 Section 7

canonicalValues.description: Suggested canonical values for the attribute

caseExact.description: Indicates if the attribute is case-sensitive

multiValued.description: Indicates if the attribute is multi-valued

mutability.description: Indicates when the attribute value can be modified

referenceTypes.description: For reference attributes, the SCIM resource types that may be referenced

required.description: Indicates if the attribute is required

returned.description: Indicates when the attribute is returned

schema.title: SchemaAttribute
